Desert Christ Park.knownFor: “ Free - Some Walking around to see the Statues ” Reviewed July 18, 2016 The site is spread across the hillside, trails are dirt and may be difficult for some people but worth your time. Shaded awning is at upper parking area to sit and see the Yucca Valley and possibly have a snack. Site has been vandalized in the past and is currently being worked on by helpers.
